item.title: 纽约批准为美光价值 1000 亿美元的半导体工厂铺设供电线路
item.description: 纽约州州长凯西-霍楚尔（Kathy Hochul）周四宣布，纽约州公共服务委员会批准了一条新的地下输电线路，将现有的克雷变电站与美光科技公司拟在奥农达加县建造的半导体巨型工厂连接起来。【原文：A new underground transmission line was approved by the New York State Public Service Commission linking an existing Clay substation with Micron Technology's proposed semiconductor megafab facility in Onondaga County, Governor Kathy Hochul announced on Thursday.】

item.title: 特朗普表示将降低 Ozempic 的价格
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）周四表示，诺和诺德公司（Novo Nordisk）最畅销的减肥药价格将下调，有关价格变动的谈判将迅速展开。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump said on Thursday that the price of Novo Nordisk's best-selling weight-loss drug would be lowered and that negotiations over price changes would be swift.】

item.title: 塞马福尔：银行正与美国财政部商谈向阿根廷贷款 200 亿美元事宜
item.description: 据 Semafor 周四援引知情人士的话报道，包括摩根大通、美国银行、高盛和花旗集团在内的银行正在与美国财政部商谈向阿根廷提供高达 200 亿美元的贷款。【原文：Bancos, entre ellos JPMorgan , Banco de América , Goldman Sachs y Citigroup están en conversaciones con el Tesoro de Estados Unidos para proporcionar hasta 20.000 millones de dólares en préstamos a Argentina, informó Semafor el jueves, citando a personas familiarizadas con el asunto.】

item.title: 美国联邦储蓄委员会提前三年撤销花旗银行歧视案
item.description: 美国最高消费者金融监督机构周四终止了一项针对花旗集团贷款部门花旗银行的 2023 年执法案件，该案件曾因该银行巨头涉嫌歧视加利福尼亚州的亚美尼亚裔美国人而对其进行处罚。【原文：The top U.S. consumer finance watchdog agency on Thursday terminated a 2023 enforcement case against Citigroup 's lending arm Citibank that had penalized the banking giant for alleged discrimination against Armenian Americans in California.】

item.title: 交易日：地区银行搅局银行业
item.description: 了解推动全球市场的力量 美洲金融与市场部责任编辑 Alden Bentley 撰文 杰米正在享受当之无愧的休息时间，但路透社市场团队仍将为您提供最新信息，让您了解今天市场关注的焦点以及市场休息的原因。我很乐意听到您的意见，请随时通过 Alden.Bentley@thomsonreuters.com 联系我。【原文：Making sense of the forces driving global markets By Alden Bentley, Editor in Charge, Americas Finance and Markets Jamie is enjoying some well-deserved time-off, but the Reuters markets team will still keep you up to date on what markets were focused on today and why they took a breather. I'd love to hear from you so please feel free to reach out at Alden.Bentley@thomsonreuters.com】

item.title: 下一篇： 德克萨斯州里奥格兰德液化天然气项目第 5 号列车实现积极 FID
item.description: 美国液化天然气生产商 NextDecade 公司周四表示，已就其位于得克萨斯州的格兰德河出口项目的第五个液化工厂（称为火车）作出了积极的最终投资决定（FID）。【原文：U.S. liquefied natural gas producer NextDecade said on Thursday it had reached a positive final investment decision (FID) on the fifth liquefaction plant, known as a train, of its Rio Grande export project in Texas.】

item.title: 日本央行总裁表示在决定 10 月份的行动时需要更多数据
item.description: 日本央行行长上田一夫周四表示，央行将仔细研究各种数据，包括他在华盛顿期间收集的信息，以决定是否在10月份加息。【原文：Bank of Japan Governor Kazuo Ueda said on Thursday the central bank will scrutinise various data, including information he collects during his stay in Washington, in deciding whether to raise interest rates in October.】

item.title: 铁路运营商 CSX 的联运量强劲，季度业绩超出预期
item.description: CSX 周四公布的第三季度利润和收入均高于华尔街预期，这主要得益于联运量的增加和商品定价的提高，使得该铁路运营商的股价上涨了 3%。【原文：CSX reported third-quarter profit and revenue above Wall Street estimates on Thursday, driven by improving intermodal volumes and higher pricing in merchandise, sending shares of the railroad operator up 3%.】

item.title: Salesforce 因人工智能软件遭作者起诉
item.description: 云计算公司 Salesforce 遭到两名作家提出的集体诉讼，他们声称该公司未经许可使用了数千本书来训练其人工智能软件。【原文：Cloud-computing firm Salesforce was hit with a proposed class action lawsuit by two authors who alleged the company used thousands of books without permission to train its artificial intelligence software.】

item.title: 英国史密斯集团将以 17.5 亿美元向科氏 Molex 出售互连部门
item.description: 史密斯集团（Smiths Group）周四表示，将向美国电子元件制造商 Molex Electronic 出售其互连部门，交易价值为 13 亿英镑（17.5 亿美元），此前该集团曾面临投资者要求解体的压力。【原文：Smiths Group said on Thursday it will sell its interconnect unit to U.S. electronic components maker Molex Electronic in a deal valued at 1.3 billion pounds ($1.75 billion), after facing investor pressure to break up the conglomerate.】

item.title: 精神航空在重组中将再解雇 365 名飞行员
item.description: 美国精神航空公司（Spirit Airlines）周四表示，该公司将在2026年第一季度解雇365名飞行员，并降低多达170名飞行员的级别，因为该公司将采取更多措施来精简员工队伍，这也是该公司在今年8月第二次申请破产后，正在进行的重组工作的一部分。【原文：Spirit Airlines on Thursday said it will furlough 365 pilots and downgrade the status of up to 170 pilots in the first quarter of 2026 as it takes additional steps to rightsize its workforce as part of its ongoing restructuring efforts after the ultra-low-cost airline filed for bankruptcy for the second time in a year in August.】

item.title: 20 国集团誓言继续关注发展中国家的债务问题
item.description: 今年由南非牵头的20个主要经济体集团周四表示，系统性债务危机的风险似乎已得到广泛控制，但许多脆弱的中低收入国家仍面临着高昂的融资成本和其他挑战，限制了它们促进经济增长的能力。【原文：The Group of 20 major economies, led this year by South Africa, said on Thursday the risk of a systemic debt crisis appears to be broadly contained, but many vulnerable low- and middle-income countries still faced high financing costs and other challenges limiting their ability to boost growth.】

item.title: 美国主要商业团体就特朗普的 10 万美元 H-1B 签证费提起诉讼
item.description: 美国最大的商业游说团体周四提起诉讼，质疑唐纳德-特朗普总统对新的高技能外国工人H-1B签证征收的10万美元费用。【原文：The largest U.S. business lobbying group filed a lawsuit on Thursday challenging President Donald Trump's $100,000 fee on new H-1B visas for highly skilled foreign workers.】

item.title: 美国联合航空公司认为美国停摆危及旅行信心
item.description: 美国联合航空公司（United Airlines）斯科特-科比（Scott Kirby）周四警告说，政府长期停摆有可能对机票预订和航班运营造成影响。【原文：United Airlines Scott Kirby warned on Thursday that an extended government shutdown risks taking a toll on airline bookings as well as flight operations.】

item.title: 彭博新闻社报道：苹果准备推出配备触摸打孔屏的高端 MacBook Pro
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周四援引知情人士的话报道，苹果公司正准备在 2026 年底或 2027 年初推出重新设计的带触摸显示屏的 MacBook Pro 电脑。【原文：Apple is preparing to launch a redesigned version of its MacBook Pro computer with a touch display for late 2026 or early 2027, Bloomberg News reported on Thursday, citing people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 白宫官员称美国会谈后印度已将俄罗斯石油进口量减少 50
item.description: 一位白宫官员周四告诉路透社，美国和印度已经举行了富有成效的贸易谈判，印度炼油商已经将俄罗斯石油进口量减少了 50%。【原文：The United States and India have held productive trade talks, and Indian refiners are already cutting Russian oil imports by 50%, a White House official told Reuters on Thursday.】

item.title: 摩根大通首席执行官称公司正在考察欧洲和拉丁美洲的银行
item.description: 摩根大通首席执行官杰米-戴蒙（Jamie Dimon）周四表示，这家美国最大的贷款机构正在考察欧洲和拉丁美洲的银行。【原文：JPMorgan Chase CEO Jamie Dimon said on Thursday the largest U.S. lender was looking at banks in Europe and Latin America.】

item.title: 2025 财年美国预算赤字下降 410 亿美元，降至 1.775 万亿美元
item.description: 美国财政部周四报告称，2025 财年美国预算赤字减少了 410 亿美元，降至 1.775 万亿美元，尽管唐纳德-特朗普总统的关税带来了 1,180 亿美元的收入增长。【原文：The U.S. budget deficit shrank by $41 billion to $1.775 trillion in the 2025 fiscal year, despite a $118 billion increase in revenues from President Donald Trump's tariffs, the Treasury Department reported on Thursday.】

item.title: 甲骨文预计30财年云基础设施收入将达1660亿美元
item.description: 甲骨文公司周四表示，预计 2030 财年云基础设施收入将达到 1660 亿美元。【原文：Oracle said on Thursday it expects cloud infrastructure revenue to be $166 billion in fiscal 2030.】

item.title: 德国默克公司称与特朗普达成协议，降低部分试管婴儿药物价格
item.description: 德国默克公司（Merck KGaA）周四表示，它已与美国总统唐纳德-特朗普达成协议，将削减体外受精治疗周期所需的一些药物的成本。【原文：Germany's Merck KGaA on Thursday said it had struck a deal with U.S. President Donald Trump that would cut the cost of some drugs needed for an in-vitro fertilization treatment cycle.】

item.title: 解说员：新任首席执行官挥舞斧头，雀巢庞大的食品帝国里有什么？
item.description: 雀巢公司新任首席执行官菲利普-纳夫拉蒂尔（Philipp Navratil）一上任就大刀阔斧地宣布裁员 16000 人，并对产品组合进行审查，可能会出售或合作多个品牌，因为这家全球最大的包装食品公司希望把重点放在快速增长的领域。【原文：Nestle's new CEO Philipp Navratil has started with a bang, announcing 16,000 job cuts and a portfolio review that could see brands sold or partnered off as the world's largest packaged food company looks to focus on fast-growing areas.】

item.title: 罗氏将以 50 美元的价格向支付现金的美国患者出售流感药片
item.description: 罗氏公司周四以50美元的现金折扣价在美国直接面向消费者销售其流感抗病毒药Xofluza，这是继竞争对手采取类似举措后的又一举措，因为它们正努力应对特朗普政府要求降低美国人处方药价格的压力。【原文：Roche on Thursday launched direct-to-consumer U.S. sales of its influenza antiviral pill Xofluza at a discounted cash price of $50, following similar moves by rivals as they scramble to address pressure from the Trump administration to lower prescription drug prices paid by Americans.】

item.title: 雷朋制造商依视路（EssilorLuxottica）因智能眼镜需求 "蓬勃发展 "而实现营收增长
item.description: 雷朋（Ray-Ban）制造商依视路（EssilorLuxottica）周四公布的第三季度营收好于预期，主要得益于可穿戴产品销售的 "蓬勃发展 "以及其最大市场北美市场的稳步增长。【原文：Ray-Ban maker EssilorLuxottica reported better than expected third-quarter revenue on Thursday, boosted by "booming" sales of wearable products and steady growth in North America, its biggest market.】

item.title: EA 最新游戏《战地 6》开售三天销量突破 700 万份
item.description: 电子艺界（Electronic Arts）视频游戏发行商周四表示，《战地6》在发售的前三天创下了专营权销售的历史新高，销量超过700万份。【原文：Electronic Arts' "Battlefield 6" has hit all-time highs for franchise sales during the first three days of its launch, selling over seven million copies, the video game publisher said on Thursday.】

item.title: Apple TV、Peacock 流媒体捆绑包将于下周推出，每月 14.99 美元
item.description: 苹果公司和康卡斯特旗下的 NBC 环球公司周四表示，将于下周推出 Apple TV 和 Peacock Premium 的捆绑流媒体服务，其中包括《泰德-拉索》和《叛徒》等获奖原创节目，月费 14.99 美元。【原文：Apple and Comcast's NBCUniversal will launch a bundle of Apple TV and Peacock Premium streaming services next week, the companies said on Thursday, combining award-winning originals such as "Ted Lasso" and "The Traitors" for $14.99 a month.】

item.title: 投资数十亿美元后，人们对人工智能泡沫看法不一
item.description: 一些公司宣布在人工智能领域投资数十亿美元，这引发了人们对泡沫形成的担忧，让人联想起互联网的繁荣与萧条。【原文：Companies announcing multi-billion dollar investments in artificial intelligence have raised concerns about the formation of a bubble reminiscent of the dotcom boom and bust.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会称 "尚不清楚 "拟议的 3 倍和 5 倍杠杆 ETF 是否会获得批准
item.description: 美国证券交易委员会告诉路透社，目前 "尚不清楚 "资产管理公司最近提交的数十份发行高杠杆 ETF 的申请是否会获得该机构的批准。【原文：The U.S. Securities & Exchange Commission told Reuters that it was "unclear" whether the dozens of recent filings by asset managers to issue highly leveraged ETFs would be approved by the agency.】

item.title: 美国立法者称 TikTok 算法的许可协议将引发 "严重关切
item.description: 众议院中国问题特别委员会主席周四表示，作为中国字节跳动公司出售美国短视频应用资产交易的一部分，TikTok 算法的使用许可协议将引发 "严重关切"。【原文：The chair of the House Select Committee on China said Thursday that a licensing agreement for use of the TikTok algorithm as part of a deal by Chinese-based ByteDance to sell U.S. assets of the short video app would raise "serious concerns."】

item.title: 美国地区性银行股受 Zions 冲销和欺诈指控影响
item.description: 美国地区性银行股周四下跌，因为 Zions Bancorporation 披露将在第三季度对其加利福尼亚分部发放的两笔商业和工业贷款进行 5000 万美元的冲销。【原文：U.S. regional bank stocks fell on Thursday after Zions Bancorporation disclosed that it would take a $50 million charge-off in the third quarter on two commercial and industrial loans extended by its California division.】

item.title: 中国称美国限制性措施破坏贸易谈判气氛
item.description: 中国商务部长王文涛表示，9 月马德里会谈后美国推出的 "密集限制措施 "严重损害了中国的利益，破坏了双边贸易磋商的气氛。【原文：China's commerce minister, Wang Wentao, said "intensive U.S. restrictive measures" rolled out after talks in Madrid in September seriously harmed China's interests and undermined the atmosphere for bilateral trade consultations.】
